segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring over the edge, creating a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing that the woman standing right there doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's diligently drying a plate, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, yet her expression remains perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so utterly oblivious to the growing flood around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This water could cause some serious damage to the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making me anxious just watching it spread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn that faucet off before things get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the steady stream of water filling the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the serene garden outside is quite stark.
segments.speaker: PAR
